sentences.english: The bleak frost packed and paved the square as with some ringing metal.

sentences.english: He was as pale as death and trembling in every limb.
sentences.chinese: 他面色慘白，手足都在哆嗦。

sentences.english: A pale blue glow filled the lane.

sentences.english: His aged head, pale and sad, seemed to be gazing at the sky.

sentences.english: Her face was dry and pale, as though she regarded herself in the light of a murderess.
sentences.chinese: 她的臉色淡漠慘白，彷彿她把自己當成了殺人兇手。

sentences.english: Aureate ray of light, spend the deadly pale on the not intentional face, also keep on covering up.

sentences.english: I swallow redundant excuses, heart is like a snow next, self-effacing of pale.
sentences.chinese: 我嚥下多餘的藉口，心像下過一場雪，頹然的慘白。

sentences.english: Not much, if any of the pale fingertips jump, cold, frozen at the moment of memory.

sentences.english: I would rather see a young man blush than turn pale. ( M. P. Cato )

sentences.english: The small Qiao mortal pale wears a face to tightly bite lips, congratulating the body equitable obtain out.

sentences.english: Her face was ghostly pale with fright.
The moon sailed out from behind the clouds and lit up the chalky face.
